Name: Bas van Straaten
Comment: If Webflow doesn't fix it.. Let's do it ourselves!I created a simple Chrome plugin that allows you to pin your default workspace. More info in this tweet: https://twitter.com/Bas_vanStraaten/status/1615351307740618754

Name: Leke Karunwi
Comment: Yup this is quite annoying. Maybe also a way to make a to make a workspace "active" so even if you are working on a clientspace and want to head back to thier dashboard you dont have to search through all the workspaces again.
